TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Series extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties

summary.span: 表示要存放的資料點和系列屬性。

span.span: Represents the data points and series attributes to store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件代表資料數列，而且會儲存在類別。A object represents a data series and is stored in the class. A儲存物件，使用類別。A stores objects using the class. 它也會儲存在資料數列的屬性。It also stores attributes of the data series. 比方說，資料數列都有色彩屬性、 背景影像屬性，背景漸層的屬性和其他等等。For example, a data series has a color attribute, background image attribute, background gradient attribute, and so forth. 屬於一系列的物件也有自己的屬性。The objects that belong to a series also have their own attributes. 一般來說，如果相同的屬性設定為資料點和其所屬的數列，資料點屬性具有優先順序。Normally, if the same attribute is set for a data point and the series to which it belongs, the data point attribute has precedence. 一系列不一定會進行繪製圖表。它可以儲存用來執行的計算的另一個數列建立並再繪製資料點值。A series is not necessarily plotted on a chart; it can store data point values that are used to perform a calculation from which another series is created and then plotted. 比方說，雖然這些數列都不會繪製數列 A，繪製時，可能會加在一起，系列 B 和 C 數列資料點的結果。For example, Series A, which is plotted, may be the result of adding Series B and Series C data points together, though neither of these series is plotted. 若要繪製物件屬性必須設定為名稱物件，用來繪製數列。In order to draw a object, the property must be set to the name of the object used to plot the series. 建立一系列時，它會自動指派，給名為 「 預設 」 的物件，或如果 「 預設 」 物件不存在時，圖表區域集合中的第一個可用的圖表區域。When a series is created, it is automatically assigned to the object named "Default", or to the first available chart area in the chart area collection if the "Default" object does not exist. 若要停用一系列的顯示，請將其屬性設為零長度字串。To disable the display of a series, set its property to a zero-length string. 屬性會決定將用來繪製這個數列中，如果它繪製的圖表類型。The property determines the type of chart that will be used to plot this series, if it is drawn.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 將建立之 物件的名稱。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.span: 這是必須為唯一名稱，否則會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: This must be a unique name; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 使用指定的數列名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可以用來建立的新執行個體類別。This constructor can be used to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此數列，才能夠儲存有一個 Y 值的物件。This series is only capable of storing objects that have one Y-value. 如果有多個 Y 值的資料點加入至這一系列，就會擲回例外狀況。If a data point that has multiple Y-values is added to this series, an exception will be thrown. 若要在執行階段建立一系列，請使用方法。To create a series at run time, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, int32 yValues) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, yValues As Integer)

param.name: name
param.span: 將建立之 物件的名稱。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 屬於這個數列之 物件所允許的 Y 值數量上限。

span.span: The maximum number of Y-values allowed for the objects that belong to this series.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和 Y 值的數量上限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and maximum number of Y-values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此數列僅能儲存並沒有比設定的最大的多個 Y 值的物件`yValues`參數。This series will only be able to store objects that do not have more Y-values than the maximum set by the `yValues` parameter. 如果您新增已與最大的多個 Y 值的資料點，就會擲回例外狀況。If you add a data point that has more Y-values than the set maximum, an exception will be thrown. 若要建立物件在執行階段，`Add`和`Insert`可以也可以使用數列集合屬性的方法。To create a object at runtime, the `Add` and `Insert` methods of the Series collection property can also be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string AxisLabel { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property AxisLabel As String

span.span: Gets or sets the axis label text for the series.

value.span: 數列的座標軸標籤文字。

span.span: The axis label text for the series.

value.span: 預設值為零長度字串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ChartArea { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於繪製資料數列 (如果有的話) 之 物件的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object used to plot the data series, if any.

value.span: 用來繪製的數列的 物件。

span.span: A object, which is used to plot the series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當一系列加入在設計階段和執行的階段時，它會自動指派給 「 預設 」物件或中的第一個可用的圖表區域如果"Default"不存在。When a series is added at both design time and run time, it is automatically assigned to the "Default" object, or the first available chart area in the if "Default" does not exist. 設定此屬性為零長度字串，如果您不想要繪製數列。Set this property to a zero-length string if you do not want the series to be plotted.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SeriesChartType ChartType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SeriesChartType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SeriesChartType value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartTypeEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的圖表類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart type of a series.

value.span: 列舉值，指出用於表示數列的圖表類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the chart type that will be used to represent the series.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定的圖表類型物件; 此值會區分大小寫。This property determines the chart type of the object; the value is case-sensitive. 請參閱一系列的所有可能的圖表類型的列舉清單。See the enumeration for a list of all possible chart types for a series.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ChartTypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartTypeEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定用於繪製數列之圖表類型的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the chart type used to draw the series.

value.span: 圖表類型的名稱。

span.span: The name of the chart type.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPointCustomProperties ^ EmptyPointStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPointCustomProperties ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DataPointCustomProperties ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標示為空資料點之資料點的繪製樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing style of points marked as empty.

value.span: 標示為空資料點之資料點的繪製樣式。

span.span: The drawing style of points marked as empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定標示為空白，例如，在的框線色彩，而在標記映像、 背景色彩或影像和其他等等的點的繪製樣式。The property determines the drawing style of points marked as empty, for example, in the border color, in the marker images, background color or images, and so forth. 某些屬性僅適用於特定圖表類型。Certain properties are only applicable for specific chart types. 例如，屬性不適用於折線圖，但未套用至區域圖。For example, the property does not apply to line charts but does apply to an area chart. 若要顯示的影像，指出空點，請使用和屬性，而非屬性。To display an image that indicates an empty point, use the and properties, and not the property. 屬性會決定空點的軸標籤。The property determines the axis label for empty points. 請注意，堆疊的圖表類型的座標軸標籤由屬性已設定此屬性的第一個繪製數列。Note that for stacked chart types, the axis label is determined by the property of the first plotted series that has this property set. 資料點可手動標示為空白藉由設定屬性`true`。Data points can be manually marked as an empty by setting the property to `true`. 或者，其中`InsertEmptyPoints`方法類別可以用來檢查遺失的資料，並插入空點，如果遺漏資料點。Alternatively, one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the class can be used to check for missing data and insert empty points if a data point is missing. > [!NOTE] > 在圖表的線條類型的情況下連接到空點的線條的線條色彩由屬性設定。In the case of line-type charts, the line color for lines that connect to an empty point is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，指出是否在呈現的圖表上顯示數列。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the series will be visible on the rendered chart.

value.span: 如果要在呈現的圖表上顯示數列，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the series will be visible on the rendered chart; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定值，決定如果數列顯示在轉譯。Gets or sets a value that determines if the series will be visible on the rendered .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsXValueIndexed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，指出資料點索引是否用於 X 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether data point indices will be used for the X-values.

value.span: 如果屬於該數列的資料點的索引會用於 X 值，則為 ，如果不會，則為 。

span.span: if the indices of data points that belong to the series will be used for X-values; if they will not.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數列中的所有資料點都使用循序索引，而且如果這個屬性是`true`則會依序繪製資料點，無論其相關聯的 X 值。All data points in a series use sequential indices, and if this property is `true` then data points will be plotted sequentially, regardless of their associated X-values. 這表示會有任何 「 遺失 」 的資料點。This means that there will be no "missing" data points. 例如，假設有 1、 2 和 4 的 X 值序列中有三 （3） 資料點。For example, assume there are three (3) data points in a series having X-values of 1, 2 and 4. 如果這個屬性是`false`，會在 x 軸位置標示為"3"中遺漏資料點。If this property was `false`, there would be a data point missing at the X-axis location labeled "3". 不過，如果您將此屬性設定為`true`、 三個資料點會繪製在點 1、 2 和 4，以循序方式，和將會有任何遺漏的資料點。However, if you set this property to `true`, the three data points will be plotted at points 1, 2, and 4, sequentially, and there will be no missing data point. 標示為"3"的 x 軸位置不會出現在圖表上。The X-axis location labeled "3" will not appear on the chart. 當您不希望有遺失的間隔，您知道您將沒有資料，例如週末資料點時，這非常有用。This is useful when you do not want to have missing data points for intervals that you know you will not have data for, such as weekends. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您要顯示多個數列，而且至少一個數列使用索引的 X 值，則所有數列必須都對齊 — 也就是有相同數目的資料點，而且對應的點必須具有相同的 X 值。If you are displaying multiple series and at least one series uses indexed X-values, then all series must be aligned—that is, have the same number of data points—and the corresponding points must have the same X-values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Legend { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 物件相關聯的數列名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the series associated with the object.

value.span: 物件的名稱

span.span: The name of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當一系列加入在設計階段和執行的階段時，會自動指派到預設物件。When a series is added at both design time and run time, it is automatically assigned to the default object. 如果您不要在圖例中顯示的數列，將此屬性設定為零長度字串，或設定屬性`false`。If you do not want the series shown in a legend, set this property to a zero-length string, or set the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerStep { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定顯示資料點標記的頻率。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 值，決定顯示資料點標記的頻率。

span.span: An value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 預設值為一 (1)。

span.span: The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定與顯示標記的頻率。The property specifies the frequency with which markers are displayed. 例如，如果您將此屬性設定為二 （2)，每個資料點會使用的標記。For example, if you set this property to two (2), every other data point will use a marker. 若啟用標記使用這個屬性只會用於屬性。This property is only used if markers are enabled using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Name { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的唯一名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 資料數列的唯一名稱。

span.span: The unique name of the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料數列的名稱必須是唯一的。否則，會擲回例外狀況。The name of a data series must be unique; otherwise, an exception will be thrown. 這個屬性可以使用索引子，當您擷取時物件從物件。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果這個屬性設定為零長度字串，就會擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartColorPalette Palette { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartColorPalette get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartColorPalette value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的調色盤。

span.span: Gets or sets the color palette of a object.

value.span: 列舉值，決定資料數列的調色盤。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines the palette for the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤用來自動將色彩指派給資料元素，如果資料點本身並沒有指派給他們的色彩，而且資料資料點所屬的物件也沒有指派的色彩。A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them and if the data object that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果沒有數列或資料點明確指定的色彩，所使用的色彩取決於圖表類型的圖表控制項調色盤或數列的調色盤，如果指定的其中一個。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the Chart control palette or Series palette, if one is specified. 請參閱下的表以取得詳細資料：See the table below for further details: |圖表類型Chart Type|使用數列的調色盤嗎？Series Palette Used?|顯示資料點的色彩Colors Displayed by Data Points| |----------------|--------------------------|-------------------------------------| |任何形狀圖 （例如，圓形圖和環圈圖）Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|否No|第一個可用的色彩，使控制調色盤。First available colors used from control palette. 每個資料點的一種色彩。One color per data point.| |形狀圖以外的所有圖表。All charts except shape charts.|否No|從第一個可用的色彩控制調色盤。First available colors from control palette. 每個資料數列的一種色彩。One color per data series.| |任何形狀圖 （例如，圓形圖和環圈圖）Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|[是]Yes|第一個可用的色彩，使調色盤。First available colors used from palette. 每個資料點的一種色彩。One color per data point.| |形狀圖以外的所有圖表。All charts except shape charts.|[是]Yes|第一個可用的色彩，使調色盤。First available colors used from palette. 每個資料數列的一種色彩。One color per data series.| 這屬性的優先順序高於屬性的根物件，對於資料的顯示。This property has precedence over the property of the root object, with respect to the display of data. 注意： 如果`Palette`兩個屬性和物件設定為 [無]，並無色彩指派給相關的資料數列/資料點，預設調色盤"BrightPastel 」 或用。NOTE: If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to None, and no color is assigned to the relevant data series/data points, the default palette "BrightPastel" or is used.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Points As DataPointCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollectionEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得資料點的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of data points.

value.span: 資料點的集合。

span.span: A collection of data points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合屬性可讓您加入和移除資料序列點。The collection property allows you to add and remove data points to a series. 這個屬性也會提供方法和屬性，可用來管理這個集合，例如尋找資料點，執行資料繫結，等等。This property also provides methods and properties that can be used to manipulate this collection, such as finding data points, performing data-binding, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a series.

value.span: 系列的陰影色彩。

span.span: The shadow color of a series.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定一個序列，它可以是任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值的陰影色彩。Gets or sets the shadow color of a series, which can be to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用來達到真實感陰影效果。請嘗試使用陰影色彩值的"128,0,0,0"。The alpha value can be used to achieve a realistic shadow effect; try using a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要實作陰影，設定屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadowOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a series.

value.span: 數列的陰影位移 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The shadow offset of the series, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要實作遮蔽，請使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值會導致往下及往右移位的陰影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 負值會導致向上和向左移位的陰影。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SmartLabelStyle ^ SmartLabelStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SmartLabelStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SmartLabelStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定智慧標籤的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the smart labels.

value.span: 智慧標籤的樣式。

summary.span: 在 上執行排序。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType XAxisType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的 X 軸類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the X-axis type of the series.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列要使用主要 X 軸還是次要 X 軸。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines if the series uses the primary or secondary X-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對所有的這類圖表類型，除了水平方向列和堆疊橫條圖和圓形圖、 環圈圖、 漏斗圖和金字塔圖形狀圖，主要 x 軸是一律低座標軸，次要軸是上層軸。For all chart types except horizontally oriented charts such as bar and stacked bar charts, and shape charts such as pie, doughnut, funnel and pyramid charts, the primary X-axis is always the lower axis and the secondary axis is the upper axis. 橫條圖和堆疊橫條圖，主要 x 軸是左的座標軸，而次要 x 軸右座標軸。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary X-axis is the left axis, and the secondary X-axis is the right axis. 當使用次要 x 軸繪製資料時，您必須使用屬性來設定軸屬性，而非屬性。When data is plotted using the secondary X-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

value.span: 用於資料繫結到數列 X 值之圖表資料來源的成員。

span.span: The member of the chart data source used to data bind to the X-value of the series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性接受的成員資料行名稱或成員的資料行的序數值。This property accepts either the name of the member column or the ordinal value of the member column.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType XValueType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定沿著 X 軸繪製的實值型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the value types plotted along the X-axis.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列儲存之 X 值資料的類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of X-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定數列所儲存的資料類型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 將此屬性設定為可讓 X 值輸入為值，而不是。Set this property to to allow the X-value to be entered as a value, and not as a . 日期和時間值會在內部儲存為.NET Framework值。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values. 同樣適用於和屬性物件。The same holds true for the and properties of objects. `IntervalType`軸標籤、 刻度和格線類別中找到的屬性會決定的間隔類型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. > [!NOTE] > 若要正確地套用所產生的資料點 X 值，使用軸標籤的格式屬性，這個屬性必須設定為。To correctly apply a format to axis labels that are generated from data point X-values, using the property, this property must be set to . 這個屬性也可用來判斷 X 值會繫結的資料類型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the X-values are bound.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType YAxisType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的 Y 軸類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y-axis type of a series.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列要使用主要 Y 軸還是次要 Y 軸。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines if a series uses the primary or secondary Y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定一系列使用主要或次要 y 軸繪製是否。The property determines if a series is plotted using the primary or secondary Y-axis. 針對所有的圖表之外的圓形圖、 環圈圖、 範圍橫條圖、 列和堆疊橫條圖，主要 y 軸是左邊的垂直軸，而次要軸右垂直軸。For all chart types except pie, doughnut, range bar, bar and stacked bar charts, the primary Y-axis is the left vertical axis, and the secondary axis is the right vertical axis. 橫條圖和堆疊橫條圖，在主座標軸是較低的水平軸，而次要 y 軸上方的水平軸。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary axis is the lower horizontal axis, and the secondary Y-axis is the upper horizontal axis. 當使用次要 y 軸繪製資料時，您必須使用屬性來設定軸屬性，而非屬性。When data is plotted using the secondary Y-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

span.span: The member columns of the chart data source used to bind data to the Y-values of the series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會接受以逗號分隔字串，包含名稱或序數資料行的值。This property accepts a comma separated string that contains the names or ordinal values of the columns.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int YValuesPerPoint { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定允許 中 物件可以擁有之 Y 值的數量上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of Y-values that objects in a are allowed to have.

value.span: 數列中允許資料點可以擁有之 Y 值數上限。

span.span: The maximum number of Y-values that the data points in a series are allowed to have.

value.span: 預設值為一 (1)。

span.span: The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將加入物件有多個 Y 值，這個屬性會指定過多的 Y 值則予以忽略。If you add a object that has more Y-values than this property specifies, the excess Y-values will be ignored. 才能正確地顯示圖表的 Y 值的數目取決於選取的圖表類型。The number of Y-values that are required to properly display a chart depends on the chart type selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType YValueType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartValueType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數列所儲存之資料點的 Y 值資料型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of Y-value data in the data points stored by a series.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列儲存之 Y 值資料的類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of Y-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定數列所儲存的資料類型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 這個屬性的值通常設定為或。The value of this property is normally set to either or . `IntervalType`軸標籤、 刻度和格線類別中找到的屬性會決定的間隔類型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. 這個屬性也可用來判斷要繫結 Y 值的資料類型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the Y-values are bound. 雖然這很罕見，它是可能繪製日期運算式做為資料點的值。It is possible to plot date expressions as the values of data points, though this is rarely done. 如果您將此屬性設定為，然後輸入做為 Y 值可以值，而不是。If you set this property to , the Y-value can then entered as a value, and not as a . 日期和時間值會在內部儲存為.NET Framework值。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values.
